ChaiScript.description: The model has to be defined here using a working equation. The equation will be evaluated using the ChaiScript Interpreter.
ChaiScript.name: ChaiScript
ChaiScript.title: Define model equation

GlobalParameterSize.description: Set number of parameters to be fitted which act globally on several subsets of a data sets
GlobalParameterSize.name: GlobalParameterSize
GlobalParameterSize.title: Number of global parameters

InputSize.description: Set number of columns, which are used as independet variables
InputSize.name: InputSize
InputSize.title: Columns of Input

LocalParameterSize.description: Set number of parameters to be fitted which act local on a single subset of a data sets
LocalParameterSize.name: LocalParameterSize
LocalParameterSize.title: Number of local parameters

Name.description: Give the model a nice name
Name.name: Name
Name.title: Model Name

PrintX.description: Define how the x / independent value has to be printed in the chart (e.g. = X1; 2*X1, X2/X1)
PrintX.name: PrintX
PrintX.title: Print x values as
